children.value: exchange! Bitfinex is a cryptocurrency exchange owned and operated by iFinex Inc., headquartered in Hong Kong and registered in the British Virgin Islands.

Bitfinex was founded in December 2012 as a peer-to-peer Bitcoin exchange, offering digital asset trading services to users worldwide. Bitfinex initially started as a P2P margin lending platform for Bitcoin and later added support for more cryptocurrencies.
Read more about how to use Bitfinex connector

<Callout
  type="note"
  body="Bitfinex connector is currently not working with cross-exchange and arbitrage strategy."
/>

exchange is also in this release! Loopring is the first scalable DEX protocol built with zkRollup for Ethereum. Loopring Exchange is the first decentralized trading platform built on top of the Loopring protocol.
Read more about how to use Loopring connector
🎛 New pure market making feature: Order Override
Advanced users can now customize and specify how Hummingbot creates orders regarding order levels, spread and size.
Since this feature is for advanced users, it is not configurable from the Hummingbot client. Follow the guide in our documentation how to use the
📈 New price reference: Last Own Trade Price
in pure market-making to allow users to review their last trade price as a price reference when creating orders.
🛫 More parameters configurable on the fly
The following parameters can now be reconfigured even without stopping the strategy. Take note that changes will take effect on the next order refresh.

<Callout
  type="note"
  body="Currently, `inventory_target_base_pct` can only be configured when running on centralized exchange connectors."
/>
This new command displays a specific market's ticker prices such as best bid, best ask, mid-price and last trade price. By default, it runs the output 10 times with 1 second in between intervals.
Optional arguments for this command and sample usage can be found in our
In the ongoing effort to make the Hummingbot code base more developer-friendly, we refactored several parts of the exchange connector code to make it easier to add additional exchanges in the future:
, most of these tasks are now contained within the connector package, you no longer need to update various other files in the Hummingbot.
